summary: A mattress salesman finds his plan to adopt a Chinese baby augmented by the arrival of a young woman, who comes into his workplace, falls asleep on one of the beds, and starts to affect his life upon waking up.
cast: Paul Dano|Zooey Deschanel|John Goodman|Edward Asner|Jane Alexander|Ian Roberts|Robert Stanton|Clarke Peters|Daniel Stewart Sherman|Mary Page Keller|Zach Galifianakis|Brian Avers|Leven Rambin|Susan Misner|Matt Walton|Ilana Levine|Louis Ozawa|Kenji|Tatsuo Ichikawa|Sean Dugan|Frank Harts|Rob Munk|Sharon Wilkins|Pierre Epstein|Sara Lamm|Tara Greenway|Zachary Knower|Mylinda Hull|Jerry Richardson|Will McLaughlin|Adam Nagata|Nicolas Cruz|Nekia Daste|Aryn Elaine|Gina Gabrielli|Cassidy Gard|RJ Konner|Anna Kuchma
title: Gigantic
